p:
Influenza is endemic in horses in the United States and much of the world, with the exception of New Zealand and Iceland (
16 ). Outbreaks of EIV infections in horses occurred globally throughout the 2000s. All inhabited continents had >1 country with an EIV outbreak during 2006–2017 ( Figure) (
8 ,
17 ), and in 2015, China, France, Germany, Ireland, Malaysia, Sweden, the United Kingdom, and the United States experienced EIV outbreaks. Ireland, the United Kingdom, and the United States also had cases or outbreaks in 2016–2017 (
17 ), as did China and Japan in 2017 (
8 ,
17 ). The United States recently experienced considerable EIV activity where the virus was detected in 23 states in 2015, 16 states in 2016, and 22 states in 2017 (
8 ,
17 ).
